name: SamuraiChef
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: samurai chef
des:
Sensei Sushi is looking to train two new apprentices. An expert chef, he is willing to show you the ropes. Every so often, however, you must prove yourself worthy by challenging Ben to a cook-off! Arthur, Sensei's assistant, has a non-stop supply of ingredients that he needs to be prepared into a meal. Slice through salmon by saying "SLICE", turn up the heat as the rice starts to simmer by saying "BOIL".

Sensei will Guide you in three unique paths. Strive to be as great of a cook as Sensei in path of chef. Become a sumo wrestler by training the most essential skill, your appetite, in path of sumo. Learn to channel your inner chi in path of guru as you avoid Arthur's powerful punches and kicks. Work your way up the ranks and earn new belts in whichever path you choose. Become one of the few to unlock the legendary black belt!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
